import React,{Component}from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import Chart from '../components/chart.component'; // import SystemGrath from'../components/SystemGrafth.component' import '../components/Admin.css' import AdminCompNav from'../components/AdminCompNav' class Admin extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ Users:[], Requsts:[], Bugs:[], SVMS:["coconut","lime","grapefruit","mango"], flag:false } // this.setflag=this.setflag.bind(this); } setflag(e){ console.log(this.state.flag) this.setState({ flag:!this.state.flag }) } SetData(){ let Responses=[3,1,5] return({ chartData:{ labels:['pending for response','accepted','declined'], datasets:[{ label:"Requests", backgroundColor:["rgba(200, 200, 15, 0.65)", "rgba(100, 200, 10, 0.65)", "rgba(255, 12, 60, 0.75)", ], data:Responses }, ] } }) } async dataAsamble(){ let Users; let Requsts; let Bugs; await axios.get("http://localhost:3000/users/") .then((res)=>Users=res.data); await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/Request/`) .then((res)=>Requsts=res.data) await axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/Bug/`) .then((res)=>Bugs=res.data) this.setState({ Users:Users, Requsts:Requsts, Bugs:Bugs, }) } componentDidMount(){ this.dataAsamble() } BugTable(){ return this.state.Bugs.map(CurrentBug=>{ const status=CurrentBug.status; const downloadURI=`http://localhost:3000/File/${CurrentBug.File}`; return((status==="pending")? {CurrentBug._id} {CurrentBug.username} {CurrentBug.email} {CurrentBug.Description} download :null) }) } UserTable(){ return this.state.Users.map(currentUser=>{ return( {currentUser._id} {currentUser.username} {currentUser.email} {currentUser.Nickname} {currentUser.Team} ) }) } render(){ console.log(this.state) return(
{/*
